profileAlternative.name: Sahir Azam
profileAlternative.headline: Chief Product Officer at MongoDB
profileAlternative.summary: High-growth SaaS/Enterprise software leader with broad experience in product management, marketing, sales, pre-sales engineering, and corporate strategy with demonstrated success at both startups and established public corporations.

aboutAlternative.text: High-growth SaaS/Enterprise software leader with broad experience in product management, marketing, sales, pre-sales engineering, and corporate strategy with demonstrated success at both startups and established public corporations.

positions.title: Director, Cloud Management Strategy & Evangelism
positions.description:

Built and led a global evangelist organization for VMware's Cloud Management business, the fastest growing business unit within the company.

given.text: Sahir is a true master of IT. His work ethic is indefatigable and his server skills are prodigious. I only wish I could hire him for a permanent position!

received.text: My wife and I were recent transplants to the Bay Area and were fortunate to have worked with Gabriella on our home purchase in San Francisco. Her depth of experience in the market helped us tremendously in finding the perfect home and navigating the complexity of a unique and complicated buying process. Gabriella was able to effectively manage and coordinate the variety of external parties required to close our transaction. Her patience, tenacity, and expertise were indispensable in our search and I would highly recommend Gabriella to anyone looking to buy a property in San Francisco!

I was fortunate to be referred to Gil for my recent house purchase. He was knowledgeable, patient, and reliable during a long and complicated  transaction. Not only was he able to keep internal resources at Wells Fargo on track, but his strong relationships externally proved invaluable in ensuring our financing process was completed successfully. I look forward to working with Gil again in the future and would highly recommend him to anyone looking for a mortgage in the Bay Area!
